attributes.title: Trump app is a loser just like Trump.
attributes.review: Disappointed in this app— doesn’t mention that the President is a lying, immoral, narcissistic con man from the big northern city gaslighting all his rural southern supporters.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.review: i hated the app!! absolutely terrible, DO NOT DOWNLOAD. My phone started glitching right after i downloaded! ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE!!! if i could i would give it 0 stars.

attributes.title: horrible do not download
attributes.review: it takes forever to download!!!!! ya know this is just not a very good quality app. poorly laid out and very insufficient and confusing. i will not be using it again on account of such poor....well everything

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: i would just like to say that this app is horrible. it took two days to download and it made my phone glitch.  it is so bad that it made my pet rock start screaming and crying while my emu was rolling around in the floor. this app isn’t worth getting. 👎

attributes.title: poopy stinky
